verses.verse: So all Israel <S%H3478><s%> were reckoned by genealogies; <S%H3187><s%> and behold, <S%H3789><s%> they are written in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> was carried away <S%H1540><s%> captive to Babylon <S%H894><s%> for their disobedience. <S%H4604><s%>

Now the first <S%H7223><s%> inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> who lived in their possessions <S%H272><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%> were Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and the Nethinim. <S%H5411><s%>

In Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%>

Uthai <S%H5793><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud, <S%H5989><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Omri, <S%H6018><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imri, <S%H566><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani, <S%H1137><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
Of the Shilonites: <S%H7888><s%> Asaiah <S%H6222><s%> the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> and his sons. <S%H1121><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah: <S%H2226><s%> Jeuel, <S%H3262><s%> and their brothers, <S%H251><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety. <S%H8673><s%>

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> Sallu <S%H5543><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hodaviah, <S%H1938><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hassenuah, <S%H5574><s%>

and Ibneiah <S%H2997><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham, <S%H3395><s%> and Elah <S%H425><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzzi, <S%H5813><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michri, <S%H4381><s%> and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel, <S%H7467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ibnijah; <S%H2998><s%>

and their brothers, <S%H251><s%> according to their generations, <S%H8435><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> - six. <S%H8337><s%> All these men <S%H582><s%> were heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses. <S%H1004><s%>
Of the priests: <S%H3548><s%> Jedaiah, <S%H3048><s%> and Jehoiarib, <S%H3080><s%> Jachin, <S%H3199><s%>

and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meraioth, <S%H4812><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> the ruler <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%>

and Adaiah <S%H5718><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham, <S%H3395><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashhur, <S%H6583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchijah, <S%H4441><s%> and Maasai <S%H4640><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adiel, <S%H5717><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahzerah, <S%H3170><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshillemith, <S%H4921><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer; <S%H564><s%>

and their brothers, <S%H251><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> one thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty; <S%H8346><s%> very able <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

Of the Levites: <S%H3881><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hasshub, <S%H2815><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azrikam, <S%H5840><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari; <S%H4847><s%>

and Bakbakkar, <S%H1230><s%> Heresh, <S%H2792><s%> and Galal, <S%H1559><s%> and Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mica, <S%H4316><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri, <S%H2147><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%>

and Obadiah <S%H5662><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah, <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Galal, <S%H1559><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asa, <S%H609><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the villages <S%H2691><s%> of the Netophathites. <S%H5200><s%>

The porters: <S%H7778><s%> Shallum, <S%H7967><s%> and Akkub, <S%H6126><s%> and Talmon, <S%H2929><s%> and Ahiman, <S%H289><s%> and their brothers <S%H251><s%> (Shallum <S%H7967><s%> was the chief <S%H7218><s%>),

who previously served in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s gate <S%H8179><s%> eastward: <S%H4217><s%> they were the porters <S%H7778><s%> for the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>

Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kore, <S%H6981><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebiasaph, <S%H43><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> the Korahites, <S%H7145><s%> were over the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service, <S%H5656><s%> keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the thresholds <S%H5592><s%> of the tent: <S%H168><s%> and their fathers <S%H1><s%> had been over the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the entry. <S%H3996><s%>
Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> was ruler <S%H5057><s%> over them in time past, <S%H6440><s%> and Yahweh was with him. <S%H3068><s%>
Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> was porter <S%H7778><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

All these who were chosen <S%H1305><s%> to be porters <S%H7778><s%> in the thresholds <S%H5592><s%> were two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twelve. <S%H8147><s%> These were reckoned by genealogy <S%H3187><s%> in their villages, <S%H2691><s%> whom <S%H1992><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> the seer <S%H7200><s%> ordained <S%H3245><s%> in their office of trust. <S%H530><s%>

So they and their children <S%H1121><s%> had the oversight of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> even the house <S%H1004><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> by wards. <S%H4931><s%>
On the four <S%H702><s%> sides <S%H7307><s%> were the porters, <S%H7778><s%> toward the east, <S%H4217><s%> west, <S%H3220><s%> north, <S%H6828><s%> and south. <S%H5045><s%>
Their brothers, <S%H251><s%> in their villages, <S%H2691><s%> were to come <S%H935><s%> in every seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> from time <S%H6256><s%> to time to be with them: <S%H6256><s%>

for the four <S%H702><s%> chief <S%H1368><s%> porters, <S%H7778><s%> who were Levites, <S%H3881><s%> were in an office <S%H530><s%> of trust, <S%H3957><s%> and were over the rooms and over the treasuries <S%H214><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

They lodged <S%H3885><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> because that duty <S%H4931><s%> was on them; <S%H4668><s%> and to them pertained its opening morning by morning. <S%H1242><s%>

Certain of <S%H5921><s%> them were in charge of <S%H5921><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> service; <S%H935><s%> for by count were these brought in and by count were these taken out. <S%H3318><s%>

Some of them also were appointed <S%H4487><s%> over the furniture, <S%H3627><s%> and over all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and over the fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and the wine, <S%H3196><s%> and the oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the frankincense, <S%H3828><s%> and the spices. <S%H1314><s%>
Some of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> prepared <S%H7543><s%> the confection <S%H4842><s%> of the spices. <S%H1314><s%>

Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> one of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> who was the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the Korahite, <S%H7145><s%> had the office <S%H530><s%> of trust over the things that were baked <S%H4639><s%> in pans. <S%H2281><s%>
Some of their brothers, <S%H251><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites, <S%H6956><s%> were over the show bread, <S%H3899><s%> to prepare <S%H3559><s%> it every Sabbath. <S%H7676><s%>

These are the singers, <S%H7891><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> who lived in the rooms <S%H3957><s%> and were free <S%H6362><s%> from other service; <S%H4399><s%> for they were employed in their work day <S%H3119><s%> and night. <S%H3915><s%>

These were heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> throughout their generations, <S%H8435><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men: <S%H3427><s%> these lived at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
In Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> there lived <S%H3427><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> Jeiel, <S%H3273><s%> whose wife <S%H802><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Maacah: <S%H4601><s%>
and his firstborn <S%H1060><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Abdon, <S%H5658><s%> and Zur, <S%H6698><s%> and Kish, <S%H7027><s%> and Baal, <S%H1168><s%> and Ner, <S%H5369><s%> and Nadab, <S%H5070><s%>
and Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> and Ahio, <S%H283><s%> and Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> and Mikloth. <S%H4732><s%>

Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shimeam. <S%H8043><s%> They also lived <S%H3427><s%> with their brothers <S%H251><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> over against their brothers. <S%H251><s%>

Ner <S%H5369><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Kish; <S%H7027><s%> and Kish <S%H7027><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Saul; <S%H7586><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> and Malchishua, <S%H4444><s%> and Abinadab, <S%H41><s%> and Eshbaal. <S%H792><s%>
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> was Merib Baal; <S%H4807><s%> and Merib Baal <S%H4807><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah: <S%H4318><s%> Pithon, <S%H6377><s%> and Melech, <S%H4429><s%> and Tahrea, <S%H8475><s%> and Ahaz.

Ahaz <S%H271><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jarah; <S%H3294><s%> and Jarah <S%H3294><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Alemeth, <S%H5964><s%> and Azmaveth, <S%H5820><s%> and Zimri; <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri <S%H2174><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Moza; <S%H4162><s%>

and Moza <S%H4162><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Binea; <S%H1150><s%> and Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Eleasah <S%H501><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Azel <S%H682><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Azel <S%H682><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> whose names <S%H8034><s%> are these: <S%H5840><s%> Azrikam, Bocheru, <S%H1074><s%> and Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> and Sheariah, <S%H8187><s%> and Obadiah, <S%H5662><s%> and Hanan: <S%H2605><s%> these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azel. <S%H682><s%>
